data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Polistes Latreille (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Polistinae) in the Philippine Islands

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Selis, Marco (2018): Revision of the genus Polistes Latreille (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Polistinae) in the Philippine Islands. Zootaxa 4531 (4): 507-531, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.4.3
